attributes.action: Every child should be allowed a relationship with thier father and not denied it by a mother
attributes.additional_details:
That all Children have a right to know who there father is and the right to have a relationship with thier father
shared parenting and equal parenting rights.
for a law to be in place  that prevents mothers from excluding fathers from childrens lives.
come on yummy mummy's..Ineed your support in this..I NEED 100,000 MOTHERS SIGNATURES!

For the fathers who do not get to see thier children and for us mothers who do put thier children first to prove we are not all like that!!

GO THE MOTHERS!! FOR THE CHILDREN AND THE FATHERS!
